items.name: Pushing Blast- The target is pushed back 10ft
Launch- the target is pushed back 20ft
Powerful Blast- the target is knocked prone
Fear Me- the target is frightened of the caster
Energy Drain- energy is pulled from the target into user. Recover health equal to half damage dealt
Glowing Ray- for 1d6 rounds the target is wreathed in fire, does 1d6 damge per round
Guiding Ray- all attack rolls made against the target are +2 for one round
Cursed Strength- the target has a -2 on strength for 1d6 rounds
Cursed Finesse- the target has a-2 on dexterity for 1d6 rounds
Cursed Body- the target has a -2 on constitution for 1d6 rounds
Cursed Mind- the target has a -2 on intelligence for 1d6 rounds
Cursed Spirit- the target has a -2 on wisdom for 1d6 rounds
Cursed Presence- the target has a -2 on charisma for 1d6 rounds
Cursed Beauty- the target’s face is horribly disfigured, has a -2 on persuasion for 1d12 rounds
Aging Curse- the target is aged by 1d12 years
Protective Blast- the user gains the effect of magic armor
Enchanting Spell- the target falls unconscious
Blinding Light- the target is blinded by a brilliant flash of light
Shrink Ray- the target is reduced in size
Zero Gravity- the target floats 5ft into the air for 1d6 rounds
Dimensional Rift- the target is transported to a random plane for 1d4 rounds and then reappears
Sluggish- the target is slowed for 1d4 rounds
Transformative Ray- the target is transformed into a beast of a small size
Disarming Ray- the target drops their weapon or shield
No Cost- the spell was used for free
Renewing Spell- recover 1d4 used spells
Invigorating Spell- recover 1d4 spells and receive 2d6 in healing
Distant Spell- double the range of caster's next spell
Extend Spell- double the duration of caster's next spell
Double Spells- cast a second spell on the same turn
Free Spell- the spell is cast as a bonus instead
Explosive Spell- the spell affects any other creature within 5ft of the target
Charming Spell- the target must make a wisdom roll or be charmed
Flaming Blade- any weapon the caster's chooses ignites into flames, does 1d6 fire damage for 1d6 turns
Deafening Blast- all creatures within 10ft of the target must make a roll or be deafened
Exhaustion- the target get -1 to all rolls until they rest
Concussive Blast- the target is stunned for one round
Paralyze- the target must make a wisdom roll or be paralyzed for 1d4 rounds
Disappearing Act- the caster becomes invisible for 1d6 rounds
Multiply- 1d4 duplicates of the caster appear
Enfeeble- the target does half damage on weapon attacks for 1d6 rounds
Encircling Wind- a wall of wind appears encircling the target in a 10ft radius for 1d6 turns
Encircling Flames- a wall of fire appears encircling the target in a 10ft radius for 1d6 turns
Encircling Stone- a wall of stone appears encircling the target in a 10ft radius for 1d6 turns
Flight- the caster gains the ability to fly for 1d6 rounds.
Speedy- the caster gains an additional 10ft of movement for 1d4 rounds
Fire Shield- flames wreathe the caster's body, causes 1d6 damage to creatures trying to touch the caster
Nightmare- the target's worst fear appears in front of it
Aggro- target must attack all creatures it sees. This lasts until the caster's next turn
Paranoia- the target sees everyone as an enemy and becomes hostile
Bound- magical threads entangle the target for 1d6 rounds.
Empower Allies- the caster and all allies within 30ft gain +2 on strength rolls for 1d6 turns
Quicken Allies- the caster and all allies within 30ft gain +2 on dexterity rolls for 1d6 turns
Toughen Allies- the caster and all allies within 30ft gain +2 on constitution rolls for 1d6 turns
Brainy Allies- the caster and all allies within 30ft gain +2 on intelligence rolls for 1d6 turns
Wise Allies- the caster and all allies within 30ft gain +2 on wisdom rolls for 1d6 turns
Charming Allies- the caster and all allies within 30ft gain +2 on charisma rolls for 1d6 turns
Baby Hand- one of the targets hands shrinks to infant size and can no longer hold anything greater than 5lbs
Magic Shield- the caster gains +2 to defense for 1d6 rounds
Magic Barrage- the caster casts a missile of magic as a bonus, 2d4 damage
Storm Caller- the caster can call forth three bolts of lightning for 3d10 damage each
Tough Skin- the caster gains damage resistance for 1d6 rounds
Adamant Bones- the caster gains damage resistance for 1d6 rounds
Poisoned Blood- the target is poisoned for 1d6 rounds.
Healing Energy- the caster regains 2d10 hit points
Birthday Suit- the target's armor and clothing are blasted from them
Suggestion- the caster may make one suggestion to the target
Healing Aura- all friendly creatures within 30ft of the caster are healed for 2d10 health
Minion- if the target dies within 1d4 turns it is raised again as caster's ally
Magic Winds- caster gains control of the air around them.
Absorb Energy- absorb any energy attacks made against caster for 1d6 turns
Quick Feet- increase caster's base movement speed by 30ft for 1 hour
Long Arms- caster's arms stretch in length, increasing reach by 5ft
Strike True- caster can give any ally within sight a +20 on their next attack roll
Break- Break any non-magical item the target is holding or wearing
True Understanding- caster gains the ability to understand all languages for 1 hour
Déjà vu- target must repeat the specific actions it took this round again for 1d4 rounds
Mind Read- secret thoughts and memories from the target feed the caster's mind
Interrogate- caster can ask the target one question they must answer truthfully
Bird Brain - target's intelligence reduced to 1 for 1d6 rounds
Magic Weapons- the caster and all allies have a +2 on attack and damage rolls for 1 minute
Stone Curse- the target slowly becomes stone. If not removed within 3 rounds the target is petrified
Web- the target becomes entangled in a sticky web
Fish Out of Water- the target can only breathe water for 1d6 turns
Fire Ants- the target perceives stinging ants biting their clothing and loses 1d6 turns scratching
Tether- the target is anchored to the ground for 1 minute and can only move 5ft from its current position
Steal Voice- the target loses the ability to speak until the curse is removed
Eruption- the target is thrown 60ft into the air and takes fall damage or impact damage if it hits a ceiling
Babble- the targets languages are replaced with random new languages
Dispel- all magical effects on the target are dispelled
Inner Beast- the target behaves as if enraged and confused for 1d6 turns
Flying Daggers- magic daggers spin around the caster in 5ft radius for 1d6 turns. They deal 5d4 damage
Wrecking Ball- throw the target at any creature within 30ft of it. Both targets take 3d6 damage
Envious Desire- the target must use his action to steal from any target nearby for 1d6 rounds
Amnesia- the target lapses into insanity and forgets his identity
Bloody Tears- target is blinded and begins to bleed from the eyes causing 2d6 damage for 1d6 turns
Stasis- the target becomes frozen in time for 1d6 turns and cannot be harmed until the effect ends
Invulnerable- the caster becomes immune to all damage for 1d6 turns.
Maze- the target is banished to a labyrinthine dimension.
Dragon Shape- caster is transformed into a young dragon for 1d6 turns
